xml.bio: Mollie Brewer is a PhD student in Human-Centered Computing, advised of Dr. Kristy Boyer. With a background in exercise science and sport performance analytics, she brings a unique blend of skills and experience to the LearnDialogue Collaborative Sport Project. Her research interests include real-time collaborative metrics during physical activity, improving wearable technology performance metrics and the application of metrics by individuals, athletes, and coaches for informed decision-making.
